duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-level administrative support including conducting research, handling information requests, and performing clerical functions.
Act as information and communication manager for the office.
Maintain office supplies inventory, order, and verify receipt of supplies.
Assist with project coordination and documentation.
Participate in client meetings and assist in the documentation of implementation processes.
Update status reports, concentrating on schedule and deliverables.
Execute and manage the invoicing efforts.
Perform clerical duties such as copying documents, mailing, and filing.
Knowledge of English composition and grammar.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required.
Experience working with executives highly preferred.
